extension.description:
Sometimes If you’re working with a lot CSS transitions on a page, you may notice some transitions run when the page loads. Most of the time this happens when you have transitions set on structural elements of a page. Although it’s a minor thing, it’s still kinda annoying. There’s a way we can rectify this using a a combination of CSS and a wee bit of JavaScript (no jQuery) and this extension is not possible without

Prevent CSS Transitions Running On Page Load
